metadata.name: Grant Agreement
metadata.author: Ecosystem Name Foundation
metadata.description: Standard grant agreement for ecosystem development funding

variables.name: Effective Date
variables.description: The date when this agreement becomes effective

variables.name: Foundation Name
variables.description: Legal name of the foundation entity

variables.name: Jurisdiction
variables.description: Legal jurisdiction under which the foundation operates

variables.name: Grant Recipient Name
variables.description: Full name of the grant recipient

variables.name: Grant Recipient Address
variables.description: Blockchain address of the grant recipient

variables.name: Work Token Name
variables.description: Name of the ecosystem's native token

variables.name: Token Allocator Name
variables.description: Name of the person designated to allocate tokens

variables.name: Token Allocator Address
variables.description: Blockchain address of the token allocator

variables.name: RFP Number
variables.description: Reference number for the Request for Proposal

validation.message: RFP number must be in format WRFP-XXX

variables.name: RFP Link
variables.description: URL link to the Request for Proposal document

variables.name: Grant Amount
variables.description: Amount of tokens to be granted to the recipient

validation.message: Grant amount must be greater than zero

content.data:
# **Grant Agreement**

This Grant Agreement (**"Agreement"**) is entered into on :variable{id="effectiveDate"}, (the **:variable{id="effectiveDate" property="name"}**), between :variable{id="foundationName"}, a :variable{id="jurisdiction"} foundation company (the **:variable{id="foundationName" property="name"}**) with D3 address :address{value="0x123f6e75d1BE0ee699C7Eb67594FEbC14ab3AA78" display="truncated"}, and :variable{id="grantRecipientName"}, an individual with address :variable{id="grantRecipientAddress"} (**:variable{id="grantRecipientName" property="name"}**).

The Foundation has been established, in part, to help promote growth of the :variable{id="ecosystemName"} ecosystem and seeks to award grants to promote development consistent with the collective decision making of the :variable{id="workTokenName"} token (**:variable{id="workTokenName"}**) holder community (the **:variable{id="workTokenName"} Community**).

The Grant Recipient has been selected by the Foundation Designated Token Allocator :variable{id="tokenAllocatorName"} (**:variable{id="tokenAllocatorName" property="name"}**) with address :variable{id="tokenAllocatorAddress"} to receive a grant subject and in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

THEREFORE, the parties agree as follows:

## **1. GRANT RECIPIENT ACTIVITIES**

1.1 Grants. Foundation and Grant Recipient are entering into this Agreement in connection with RFP#: :variable{id="rfpNumber"}, as set forth at :variable{id="rfpLink"}, which describes the specific activities to be performed by Grant Recipient (the **"Grant"**).

1.2 Performance of Grant Recipient Activities. Grant Recipient will perform the activities described in the Grant (the **"Grant Recipient Activities"**) in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth in each such Grant and this Agreement and with any applicable laws.

## **2. GRANT DISTRIBUTION**

The Token Allocator will pay Grant Recipient on behalf of the Foundation the amount of :variable{id="grantAmount"} :variable{id="workTokenName"} tokens in accordance with the terms set forth in this agreement.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Grant Recipient has executed this Agreement on the date first written above.

Name: :variable{id="grantRecipientName"}

grantRecipientSignature.description: EIP712 signature from the grant recipient accepting the terms of the grant agreement

workApprovedSignature.description: EIP712 signature from the token allocator attesting that the grant work has been completed successfully

workRejectedSignature.description: EIP712 signature from the token allocator attesting that the grant work has been rejected
